alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and central Broward Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weston, or near Pembroke Pines, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, Weston, Doral, North Lauderdale, Miami Lakes and Cooper City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
